novaSortable.reorderingDisabledTooltip.a: Reordering is disabled with active sort options.
novaSortable.reorderingDisabledTooltip.n: Reordering is not allowed for this resource.
novaSortable.moveToStartSuccessful: Resource successfully moved to first position.
novaSortable.moveToEndSuccessful: Resource successfully moved to last position.
novaSortable.reorderError: An error occurred while trying to reorder the resource.
novaSortable.reorderNotAllowedFor: Reordering resource with ID :id not allowed.
